title: bug?
body: 1. is there a bug or glitch with leblanc at the moment because she is glitching on my screen not sure if its just my pc but yeh

replies.body:
Hey there,

From the very broad description you've given I can only assume you're experiencing an issue with her model being displayed.

This is quite a simple fix, all you have to do is [run a client repair](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes#wq6). Let me know how you go.
